paths.p: Wikipedia's even numbers (cycle over integers, starting from 0, with step 2)
Wikipedia's Astronomy Portal's picture of the week (limited cycle of weeknumbers (2 digits: ':2}') 1...53 inside another, unlimited cycle of years)
Nemi comix (cycle over dates, scrolled backwards ('.-1'). See PHP's date() format characters Y,y,m,n,j,d,w)
